sample.title: Trivium Cipher
sample.description: Trivium is a synchronous stream cipher that represents a compromise between simple and powerful implementability in hardware and efficient implementation in software.

replacement.value: {\b Trivium} is a synchronous stream cipher that represents a compromise between simple and powerful implementability in hardware and efficient implementation in software.\line\line Trivium was developed by two Belgian cryptographers, Bart Preneel and Christophe De Cannière. The two submitted the method as a candidate for Profile II (hardware method) of the eSTREAM competition.\line \line Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trivium_(cipher)
